info.name: Chaingateway Documentation
info.description: Browse the Blockchain API docs and tutorials for the Chaingateway Blockchain API

item.name: Tron API
item.description: APIs for interacting with the Tron Blockchain

item.name: Tron Blockchain Queries
item.description: General Tron API requests to fetch blockchain informations such as block height, block details, balances etc.

request.description: This method returns the latest block number of the Tron blockchain

item.name: Get block by number or hash

variable.description: The block number

request.description: This method returns the block by its number

variable.description: The address to fetch the balance for

request.description: This method returns the balance of the specified address

variable.description: The address to fetch the balance for
The contract address

request.description: This method returns the balance of the specified address for the specified token

variable.description: The contract address

request.description: This method returns the contract information of the specified contract

variable.description: The address to fetch the balance for
The token id

request.description: This method returns the balance of the specified address for the specified token
This method returns the chain parameters of the Tron blockchain

item.name: Tron Transactions
item.description:
APIs for managing Tron transactions
createing a new transaction will increase the transaction usage
We support the following Transaction types:
- Default: Sending TRX
- TRC10: Sending Tokens
- TRC20: Sending Tokens
- TRC721: Sening NFT's

variable.description: The page number

request.description:
This method lists your transaction history. It lists all transactions including TRC20 and TRC721 transactions.
Please note that we dont index your addresses. We list only transactions that were made with the Chaingateway API

variable.description: The transaction hash
If set to 'decoded' it will return the decoded transaction

request.description:
This method shows a transaction
If the transaction is successful, it will return the transaction details.
If the transaction fails, it will return an error message.

This method creates a new transaction.
If the transaction is successful, it will return the transaction hash.
If the transaction fails, it will return an error message.

response.body: {"status":422,"ok":false,"message":"class org.tron.core.exception.ContractValidateException : Validate TransferContract error, balance is not sufficient.","errors":[]}
response.name: Insufficent funds

response.body: {"status":422,"ok":false,"message":"Validate signature error: 0984bea42fc16d38512ef3f3ae0ad36b7123d1804a8b284106005793d441b2dd2d1bfdad10ec2879e06a35bbb9a89f268b81b79bc35f6031784c32fe60eee65e01 is signed by TT61CoyUW1ZwkcpkZAcortLvpYk7TW4fgD but it is not contained of permission.","errors":[]}
response.name: Wrong privatekey

item.name: Show Transaction Receipt This method shows a transaction receipt

variable.description: The transaction hash
If set to 'decoded' it will return the decoded transaction

request.description:
This method creates a new ERC20 transaction.
If the transaction is successful, it will return the transaction hash.
If the transaction fails, it will return an error message.

response.body: {"status":422,"ok":false,"message":"class org.tron.core.exception.ContractValidateException : Validate TransferContract error, balance is not sufficient.","errors":[]}
response.name: Insufficent funds

response.body: {"status":422,"ok":false,"message":"Validate signature error: 0984bea42fc16d38512ef3f3ae0ad36b7123d1804a8b284106005793d441b2dd2d1bfdad10ec2879e06a35bbb9a89f268b81b79bc35f6031784c32fe60eee65e01 is signed by TT61CoyUW1ZwkcpkZAcortLvpYk7TW4fgD but it is not contained of permission.","errors":[]}
response.name: Wrong privatekey

request.description:
This method creates a new ERC721 transaction.
If the transaction is successful, it will return the transaction hash.
If the transaction fails, it will return an error message.

response.body: {"status":422,"ok":false,"message":"class org.tron.core.exception.ContractValidateException : Validate TransferContract error, balance is not sufficient.","errors":[]}
response.name: Insufficent funds

response.body: {"status":422,"ok":false,"message":"Validate signature error: 0984bea42fc16d38512ef3f3ae0ad36b7123d1804a8b284106005793d441b2dd2d1bfdad10ec2879e06a35bbb9a89f268b81b79bc35f6031784c32fe60eee65e01 is signed by TT61CoyUW1ZwkcpkZAcortLvpYk7TW4fgD but it is not contained of permission.","errors":[]}

item.name: Tron Addresses
item.description:
APIs for managing tron addresses
createing a new address will increase the address used usage and deleting an address will decrease it.

request.description:
Creates a new address wich can be used to send and receive crypto currencies, ERC20 and ERC721 tokens.
please provide a stron password within the request body. You will need the password everytime you interact with your address.

<aside class="notice">We do not store Passowrds! If you lose it, we cannot restore your wallet! </aside>

item.name: Tron Staking
item.description: APIs for staking, delegating and unstaking TRX

request.description:
Freezing is used to obtain resources, such as Bandwidth and Energy, which are required to perform transactions on the Tron network. Freezing balance is a requirement for delegating resources to other addresses.
To ensure proper freezing of balance, you need to ensure that you have enough balance to freeze

Unfreezing is used to release resources, such as Bandwidth and Energy, which are required to perform transactions on the Tron network. Unfreezing balance is a requirement for delegating resources to other addresses.
To ensure proper unfreezing of balance, you need to ensure that you already freezed balance to this address

response.body: {"status":422,"ok":false,"message":"class org.tron.core.exception.ContractValidateException : delegateBalance must be less than or equal to available FreezeEnergyV2 balance","errors":[]}
response.name: Not enough freezed balance

response.body: {"status":422,"ok":false,"message":"class org.tron.core.exception.ContractValidateException : receiverAddress must not be the same as ownerAddress","errors":[]}
response.name: Receiver same as owner

request.description:
Undelegation is used to release delegated resources, such as Bandwidth and Energy, which are required to perform transactions on the Tron network. Undelegating balance is a requirement for voting for Super Representatives and obtaining rewards.
To ensure proper delegation of balance, you need to ensure that you already delegated ressources to this address

item.name: Tron Webhooks
item.description:
Chaingateway.io provides a webhook functionality for Tron to enable real-time communication and event notification between the service and external systems.

Webhooks are essential for staying updated on transaction statuses, payment confirmations, and other critical events related to blockchain transactions.

request.description: Lists all webhooks created by the user.
Creates a new webhook for real-time communication and event notification.

variable.description: The UUID of the webhook you want to show.

request.description: Show the details of a Webhook

variable.description: The UUID of the webhook you want to update.

request.description: Updates an existing webhook with the provided data.

variable.description: The UUID of the webhook you want to delete.

request.description: This method will delete the specified webhook.

item.name: Ethereum Addresses
item.description:
APIs for managing ethereum addresses
createing a new address will increase the address used usage and deleting an address will decrease it.

request.description: Lists all addresses you have created but not yet deleted

Creates a new address wich can be used to send and receive crypto currencies, ERC20 and ERC721 tokens.
please provide a stron password within the request body. You will need the password everytime you interact with your address.

<aside class="notice">We do not store Passowrds! If you lose it, we cannot restore your wallet! </aside>

variable.description: The address you want to delete.

request.description: This method will delete your address. This decreases your used address metrics

variable.description: The address you want to export.

request.description: This method will export the keystore file and filename.

We support the following Transaction types:

request.description: Lists all transactions created by our api. Please note that this will only list transactions created by our api as wo currently do not offer an transaction index.

variable.description: The transaction id of the transaction
If the transaction should be decoded

item.name: Bitcoin Wallets
item.description:
Bitcoin API for managing Bitcoin wallets
creating a new address will increase the address usage

request.description: Lists all addresses you have created but not yet deleted

variable.description: The wallet.

request.description:
Creates a new address wich can be used to send and receive crypto currencies, ERC20 and ERC721 tokens.
please provide a stron password within the request body. You will need the password everytime you interact with your address.

<aside class="notice">We do not store Passowrds! If you lose it, we cannot restore your wallet! </aside>

variable.description: The address you want to delete.

request.description: This method will delete your address. This decreases your used address metrics

variable.description: The wallet you want to get the addresses from.

request.description: This method will return all addresses of a wallet

variable.description: The wallet you want to create a new address for.

request.description: This method will create a new address. This decreases your used address metrics
